name: Book Cover
overview: Fallback cover extraction for books (PDF, EPUB) and audiobooks (MP3, M4A, M4B, FLAC).
description: Fallback cover provider for Jellyfin book and audiobook libraries. Extracts PDF first pages, searches EPUB archives for covers, and extracts embedded artwork from audio files via ffmpeg raw stream copy â€” handling mislabeled codec tags that break the built-in Image Extractor.
